title: Hype It Out All the Way Through!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>I can’t wait for today’s event~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Uooooooh! Ai is so excited~~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>We’re too excited that we got here too early, huh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>You’re right.... Then, before it starts, let’s take a walk in that park over there.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Good idea. I got this itch from the hype for the event that I can’t sit still.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Me too~. Let’s look at nature for a little bit and calm down....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>No.... I can’t calm down after all!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hmm, let’s see. Then, why don’t we tell each other what things excite us on today’s event while walking?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>But that would get me even more and more excited~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>We’ve come this far after all, so let’s just hype it out all the way through!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
